name: SUPER KINKY
description: SUPER KINKY is a fast-paced, run-and-gun, score-attack shooter featuring three different close-quarters arenas that are designed to keep the action intense. Beat off endless hordes of hellspawn as you desperately try to score. Devil Daggers style gameplay with dongers...Devil Dongers.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit Processor: Intel i5 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 970 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
